issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Some SerDes like JSONSerde are not packaged with LLAP. One cannot localize jars on the daemon (due to security consideration if nothing else), so we should package them.

comments.body: The patch. [~hagleitn] [~gopalv] can you take a look?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12776629/HIVE-12633.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12777219 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
[~sershe]: making minor edits instead of review, is that ok?
Changed the default aux classes to be always included and change the continue into a if (!)
Makes sense. Is that also a +1? :)
Yes, my seal of approval included (+1).
